alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Izard; Searcy; Stone; Van Buren; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 10:20PM CDT until November 04 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Stone County in north central Arkansas... Eastern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Western Izard County in north central Arkansas... Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Western Cleburne County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Baxter County in north central Arkansas... Eastern Conway County in central Arkansas... Northern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Northwestern White County in central Arkansas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1020 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Watts to Hill Creek, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Heber Springs... Mountain View... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Marshall... Greenbrier... Calico Rock... Greers Ferry... Wooster... Quitman... Guy... Rose Bud... Damascus... Twin Groves... Menifee... Shirley... Pineville... Higden... Bethlehem... Hill Creek... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and north central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and north central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Izard; Searcy; Stone; Van Buren; White
